name: gs1code128
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gs1_code128_generator.
Tool description: This API returns a GS1-Code128 Barcode in PNG format based on company prefix, code, quantity and lot
API description: Generates a GS1-128 barcode based on provided data and company prefix, with optional lot and quantity information.

data.description: The input data to encode into the barcode.

company_prefix.description: The company prefix required for generating the barcode.

lot.description: The lot number to include in the barcode. Defaults to 'AB123'.

qty.description: The quantity to include in the barcode. Defaults to '100'.
